content: - designed by juan the yarn addict suggested materials any soft yarn wool is not recommended especially if you are donating hats for 4 wt yarn use a 6 5 mm hook for approximately 14 head for smaller heads decrease hook size to a 6mm or 5 5mm abbreviations/meanings chain chain double_crochet double_crochet half_double_crochet half_double_crochet single_crochet single_crochet skip skip st stitch/stitches round 1 start with a slip knot on your hook and chain 4 slip_stitch into first chain to form a circle or you can use the magic_ring chain 2 does not count as a st place 8 half_double_crochet into the circle then slip_stitch into first st to close round round 2 chain 2 does not count then go back into the same stitch and place 2 half_double_crochet place 2 half_double_crochet into each st of the round slip st into first st to close round 16 half_double_crochet round 3 chain 2 does not count half_double_crochet into same st place 2 half_double_crochet in the next st * 1 half_double_crochet 2 half_double_crochet in the next repeat from * until end of round slip st into first st to close round 24 half_double_crochet round 4 chain 2 does not count 1 half_double_crochet into same st half_double_crochet in next st 2 half_double_crochet in the next * 1 half_double_crochet into next 2 st 2 half_double_crochet in the next repeat from * until end of round slip st into first st to close round 32 half_double_crochet round 5 chain 2 does not count 1 half_double_crochet into same st 1 half_double_crochet in the next 2 sts 2 half_double_crochet in the next * 1 half_double_crochet in the next 3 st 2 half_double_crochet into next st repeat from * until end of round slip st into first st to close round 40 half_double_crochet round 6 chain 2 does not count 1 half_double_crochet into same st 1 half_double_crochet into the next 3 sts 2 half_double_crochet in the next * 1 half_double_crochet in the next 4 st 2 half_double_crochet into next st repeat from * until end of round slip st into first st to close round 48 half_double_crochet round 7 mini windows chain 1 go into same st with 1 single_crochet chain 1 skip 1 single_crochet in next st * chain 1 skip 1 single_crochet in next st repeat from * until end of the round chain 1 slip st into first st to close round round 8 twins in the windows start by slip stitching into the first chain space window from previous round chain 3 this counts as a double_crochet go back into the window chain space and place 1 double_crochet go to next window and place 2 double_crochet continue in this pattern to the end of the round slip st into the 3rd chain to close round round 9 half_double_crochet chain 2 does not count half_double_crochet into the same st place 1 half_double_crochet into every st of the round slip st into first st to close round you should still have 48 sts round 10 3 peas
